item.title: 爱沙尼亚说，3架俄罗斯战斗机在“ Brazen” Intursion -AP News进入其领空
item.description: 爱沙尼亚说3俄罗斯战斗机在'Brazen'Incursion ＆nbsp; ap ap news 北约在爱沙尼亚的空域上拦截了三个俄罗斯喷气机＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn 三个俄罗斯战斗机在'Brazen'入侵中输入爱沙尼亚空域＆nbsp; nbsp; 以色列时代href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmimafbvv95cuxonwzpatvzqzqzjzjzb0zb0ztdnfk81wwjhu2rrrrrr2hhrus3hrus3ani1sm5nogf5nogf5strrsue ZOXDGDJFGDETZDV91NW5FYVDVDB2ZGPXZM42BEDHUJRKZKK1VRGSWRGSWHN2EM5SOWXAVUDYLXDQR2E3O3OEEY0TEFPAKFERMXIFPPPAKFERMXIOFNFTGJTEGGJTEGGVMQVMQVMQVMQVMQVU5UMHFUHBFUHBFUHBFUHBFUHBFUHB3B3.UGHB33 tnwundr2twblzxydibngfbvv95cuxpc2i1bhrndmdrtjdhb0hb0h2rupqoel6ykpuuxywtkdnrwtnrwtnrwhilvvmoeppaktzai1roc1oy3bls0ventlflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflflwkwyk80owdfa. item.title: 联合国安理会采取行动对伊朗实施“快回”制裁
item.description: 联合国安理会采取行动，对伊朗实施“快回”制裁＆nbsp;＆nbsp; axios 联合国安理会拒绝延长伊朗制裁救济的决议＆nbsp; nbsp; al Jazeera 联合国安理会拒绝竞标继续伊朗制裁救济＆nbsp; nbsp; un news 欧洲在跨大西洋力量游戏中使用伊朗作为棋子href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmitwfbvvv95cuxpaevynxyycnjkewkewf3exrqa0fxzhbdddhjkn0dpdpdwppu0uts W9TTDVFZ1FPMUJPS3F3clJ5MHhyTy14YV94aVI3MDZzbm5Wd1lkaFp6cG1BM0dJcDY1RF82WTJPN3BRUzJJN18tSWVBLTFXZkZkUm82cV ViMkY1R1h0R0pzek9PNU1Mel9aRER1MUthUUNiS3pVQmZINmdxZmtOLXBvMUlMWnJMdTg3MmdlWGNqaW1BWE3SAVZBVV95cUxQRmRqT0l 6auJOAWVZMEX4NDDQD21WNM1KBGPFZWNZA0TZMVJ6AE9EA240DKJNSULBDELJUULNEM1YBDVHHDWLHDWQTUTR4VLHDWQTUTR4VLVLVPVPVPVPVPVMDHQXZQZQZW？ target =“ _ blank”>联合国安全委员会投票反对在截止日期之前提出伊朗'快照'制裁＆nbsp; nbsp; nbc new> nbc news

item.title: “令人痛苦的超越描述”：在苏丹的祈祷中被杀数十人 - 《纽约时报》

item.title: 在特朗普的压力下，欧盟提议追随中国公司购买俄罗斯石油 - 《华尔街日报》
item.description: 在特朗普的压力下，欧盟提议追随中国公司购买俄罗斯石油＆nbsp; nbsp; 《华尔街日报》 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmivgfbvv95cuxny1e0dvdnhoskewun RDN09XWMJ6DEDRV2HHMWHZU9QSKC4Q1K2DG9TMMFKZETORDZXVUW0B1LRVMNRAWHRMWHRMWC3M0ZRZFG 0yuriz0jpwvf2vnl6eluzcenxcdbisepcuvfxenjlyljxbtdka05suhnsdk0ogxmlwv4mnpscwxy eepiadhuyvnsm0dhvdhsqv8zsgpqexbwzuoxutnabuxuu2g2nklhu3r3r3vi1pemlscgvjcnrb？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>在特朗普压力之后，欧盟的目标是提出俄罗斯液化天然气进口禁令＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters 欧洲宣布新的制裁，以加大对俄罗斯的压力＆nbsp; nbsp; 《纽约时报》 乌克兰更新：欧盟提出了新的俄罗斯制裁＆nbsp;＆nbsp; dw 欧洲委员会提出针对俄罗斯的新制裁＆nbsp; cnn

item.title: 塔利班从阿富汗拘留中释放英国夫妇 - 半岛电视台
item.description: 塔利班从阿富汗拘留中释放英国夫妇＆nbsp; nbsp; al Jazeera 塔利班释放英国夫妇，彼得和芭比娃娃雷诺兹，在阿富汗被拘留了几个月 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiuwFBVV95cUxOd1RYcEhyMWxrNTkwQXlQVnNuTzRJaGlvRXlXNTJvaktzUllMWHBOTWZHY0x0VjZFS2VGdTlBOTFRWWRwVV axnezyeevhnln2dnnyz284cevmwwprvnfitdzrrtv2q2 vodtvwdxe2vkt5m0nvvwpuru5ia DFNR2FISNLTAVI3MHAWEK9TM3L1C1Z5A2QYVLPSMFHFMGO0EMPPOHLTVGK5BLZ5BLZ6Z6Z0FOBMXY bvnqmmhhm2tuyzhj0ghaaufvx3lxte1oq3fhq1u5bvjjjmkdhdhdvoxn3ezbjnknkovpyzko1bkd YOXDRQLFWX0O4NEZJTWVUSKV0SL8TDDWZVZZN3ZXV0Z0E2NHHPMZKWMZVOR0F5TKTQQQKV1ZW d5NlkzTDBpUkJhTDllVlFKc2ZITzF2LVJ0cmtzcm1OYm14WWM5REstSEtTUkxkd2pERXhWa043ZlFGVjhNODMwV01HdlhQSUl4clhhbEpYaWNIckdEakJxWUV5OUdFUk1xN3U0Qg?oc=5" Target =“ _ blank”>塔利班在谈判后八个月后被塔利班发行的老年英国夫妇＆nbsp; nbsp; fox News 家庭在释放英国夫妇时说'巨大的喜悦'被拘留在阿富汗＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMikgFBVV95cUxPVjRTeHQ2SS1KcnZxZ180cmNNMFJ4a3pjdXV3MjFHc3VPOWVZckQ0UnliMXNqbDdaeF rmsvl3bfnremlxvwpdazlqm2jithvtbll0dlfqtgtisvm4wktvzndxzkzhejnonxmyvg8zevg8zevjjoyln5rn5rn5r1fhbrchbrcbrcbrcbrcbrcnfflhdujkcnffflagcnfoz2thr3ipvg8xnpvg8xq？ target =“ _ blank”>塔利班在拘留几个月后发行的英国夫妇＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn

item.title: 印度表示，与巴基斯坦协议后，沙特阿拉伯会介意“敏感性” - 路透社
item.description: 印度说，与巴基斯坦协议后，沙特阿拉伯会介意'敏感性' href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmihajbvv95cuxpafa3v0ndedhamlitr0zrdeptoxjxtxrrrnc2sfrzq 2S5Z1BTRVCZDMPXY2DSBHK1VZVLSXVYSG82TZNQES1ZUXHQYXG0OWFNDNFNDNFTQVPTSVDTC0E4QMRPVWE0ZGNRTUJKBBWNDVGOXNVJNAK fhohjtcmjuntnkwfpjv0ewrm1vtlrrcunxa00zwuramdd3zuxybtu0dfnvlux1r0n6wuhxbwnmseytsmhzltsmhzltffgcgcgcgl5uvhsbnsbnsbnsbnrjter BTXB0VXB5ATHZREW4ZDKWWGXYOTBTBUJGNFZIMGD6TJC2ZJA4Q2ZJA4Q2LQCGCGR0WTBUEKN1ATRPQ2K1MG9NBLFNAWHPZGXGXDMUV2RW？OC = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>“是的，绝对”：沙特阿拉伯的帕克部长参与与印度的战争＆nbsp; nbsp; ndtv 巴基斯坦说，可以根据国防条约为沙特阿拉伯提供其核计划＆nbsp; nbsp; 沙特阿拉伯寻求新的安全联盟作为美国的信任＆nbsp; nbsp; 《华尔街日报》 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMisAFBVV95cUxOTU12eUREcjdfak9Fc0FoNWhXb2x1WlZTc0ZnaEQ5VS1ZM3M4X0YzZlhDVEc1T29udENzLUhkX3l tqkdtafrsy3jybm1hmhqtz3jccuk0umhwm2hpyzlqzxltntlrtlrtlrtw5tcjQ3vfvzbllmcn H0CDQ1Q292QK5ZD2VBYLHBM3PHEG5PNHK3HK3UKVWYM15LWXNVG85AGPWNTGZDDVIV1MXDW EtUE5WLUd3cXdndNIBtgFBVV95cUxQZXRDS0hHRW1MWkVuYTRGOGoxWjVpV005RWRhVHFRaGpYRGtndVFtX0RJQXIyVU02U3NaWW5Fa0NlSEV0N1djbjdiQllzZ1JQZlZTRzRvN lNNSkNoOG11MEkwZWowamJ6OUE0Y0ZIbGtWVDFRc3VoYWpLWWNwYTVkRWlVemVkY0NiRkFHa1NpMm1hRkJ1ODRzRUVHQ1JES2tqWXBXbUdYZ044cUg4WlYyeFR0QVkzdw?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>'流域'：沙特 - 巴基斯坦国防条约如何重塑地区的地缘政治 ＆nbsp; <font color =“＃6f6f6f”

item.title: 强烈的地震击中了俄罗斯的kamchatka，没有损害 - 路透社
item.description: 强烈的地震击中俄罗斯的kamchatka，没有报道的损害＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS kamchatka地区州长说，地震强度为7.2，发出海啸警告 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmijwfbvv95cuxougk1z3ixqmu0betnatrjzdjmedhvtl96yvvvfbtnqvfbtnqvfbtnqvfbtnqvffbtnqvvvvvvvvvllongvxy2zfu1p2nuv4 uvhbtlm5tzjuvufpngtlmxnongz4ujg4bvbutmhiz1vknehsbghirer4q1vvmvbhm1bvbhm1bvbhm1bvbhm1bvwww42xjsv9 srv9sr target =“ _ blank”>多个地震猛击俄罗斯海岸线＆nbsp;＆nbsp; newsweek 在阿拉斯加取消的tsunami咨询 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMitAFBVV95cUxNdlhsVzI3cHZOdmU1Wk9rMnQzRlkzUDlNSzNlek9KYnR0WVVwMVU1MFpfQjRJOW5jRGh0cmphMFRaMmNEQm9 UMC13UEpKTXJxRXhnSXlLMnRYN3ltRXV4TmNnTzhBbEpxeUdvaUgyVTRuOWJJNzBGMktEWHhoRHBJMUNraVFfaTI4ZXRhMUFXUksyWENjOU1RYU40Xy1yMlF6bmp0MHctU3BUZWFJVzBNN ZZCZGHSACGBQVVFFEXFMUFZQRDNGT3DCZHLFRDBCMW5PUNJCSFNNCTDLEWFHQZNXBDNOCKDP TWC5SDVAVVG2CGYZMW83A0ZLVEZ0EKXVCFZOZLM5T0VIBGSTBXRJBHU1RNZ0NDDDZVEW0ZNL 2ew1vzldhoe0wnxfvwmrrur1vvf4wudjmhp6n1bicxzkcwnaank3ndhynnblmmnblmmnhnlflnflnqnr3twjys3e5b3rnm1d4nunm1d4nujwoxhorg0ymuzzlwlud2ttttttttttttttttfricxhm oc = 54nujwoxhorg0ymuzzhorg0m target =“ _ blank”> 7.8级地震，kamchatka是自7月以来的许多余震之一之一

item.title: 特朗普在英国皇家待遇后确认“不朽的债券” - 华盛顿邮报
item.description: 特朗普在英国皇家待遇后肯定'不朽的债券' href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmilwfbvv95cuxooxdyteprqvzvzvqmfdvfb1z4unfsb05iidu5pd2t2t2t5dxi5dxi5dxi5dqdq4ltfeeneo5c4ltfeneo5q0npyk9bc1 bc1 bc1rauuuu unuu GFQD2ZVQW9HS2JNRW02Y0HUDG56EEPSZXCTUELVBE1KTJVYYVNZEI0ZRVZEU0K3UENNYWENNYWFYVZFRNHPJA1NQV0VKBU1NQV0VBU1MMER2BGVBGVBGVBVBVBWWWUTZUPNCUPNCU9CJJHZRENCRENCRE target =“ _ blank”>总统特朗普签署了执行命令＆nbsp;＆nbsp; c-span 部长拒绝特朗普呼吁军方解决非法移民＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc 特朗普和starmer，打开差异，在英国 ＆nbsp; nbsp; 《纽约时报》 特朗普告诉英国'召集军队'控制其边界| Donald Trump ＆nbsp; 守护者

item.title: 美国否决“不可接受的”安全委员会关于加沙未能谴责哈马斯的决议 - 以色列时报
item.description: 美国否决者'不可接受的'安全理事会对加沙关于加沙的决议，否则未能谴责哈马斯＆nbsp; 以色列时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwkfvx3lxte9uqmttehg2vxcxanfkwlhsafjvsnjn CVZUOTNQM3FLSTZSWHVHV3R0CLDILW5KRFEZU24XSVFXRVRVRVR2I0OHRBX0XLQVPTUPTU2JHQKTHDGJXDW？OC = 5英寸target =“ _ blank”>美国第六次加沙停火＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc 标题为2025年9月19日＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 民主现在！ 我们在联合国在加沙的战争中对第6届否决href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmi2afbvv95cuxontm3nm40ltddwsy1lsujqvnhklvq 3Mlbbrktltmxpsfnmwhfeve1sbvlmakowujfbugc1dtnlotrdtfpjntg5b5b0zrznc2ulrsbwvtntvqz2s0yuxlt 1ZKUWREDNLATG54CTJBRK5KAI1WDK1IU3HOOUR3BKTQMM1EZ0JGC0FQAL9HCFR5SHHYUVOXAXALDXAMV2CFZJBMV IZGDKC1ZCWEXJZVV2C1PUNWJYZGV0DJRON1QWCV9NTTNNQLRASZI2C1LVLTJOYKNNAMFEBL82MUZQR1CR1MUZQR1C？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>我们在停火时的第六否决权，人质释放是以色列在加沙地进行歼灭运动的绿灯＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 6f6f6f“>

item.title: 伯尼·桑德斯（Bernie Sanders）首次将以色列在加沙的战争称为种族灭绝 - 华盛顿邮报
item.description: ＆nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmihwfbvv95cuxodwu4nn1m3as1wwdbty3azamvtzw1oemllu0pxs2jyuulfnfnfpkrdvdr0l0lququez 4RKPWDVP0QKRYS1FYVEPKQ2H0VGFCUULTTHDDWFFSSUNIX09JQS1OYVB5ZLHBWEFTZMX6EJYWYUJYUJWAXNGV0XHAXNGV0XHAMFXHAMFXHAMFXHAMFXUWRXQS1JV0PPPCVFCYTFVDHC？ target =“ _ blank”>以色列正在加沙犯下种族灭绝，联合国询问发现＆nbsp; nbsp; npr 是种族灭绝＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 美国。参议院（.gov） 桑德斯首次将加沙的战争称为'种族灭绝' href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMigwFBVV95cUxNeHJycVBaQUhpeDBNWnhtQnl6REZRZEE2UXhJd3BuVzJLcl9tNzFxNk1k sfppevbkcdvpuwm5zxptthi5bmg0uezcbfnpztn3zmitha2nmz0lsa25mrnnzqvnxogfqvnxogfqvtnqvtnqbbl9jltvbbl9jltvqqvq q q q q qjyj ftnuvtnuvtnuvtthvjqttthvjqtqtqtqxwnhgaw？ target =“ _ blank”>以色列正在犯下种族灭绝的共识＆nbsp; nbsp; vox.com

item.title: 中国国防部长续签威胁要在开放安全论坛时接管台湾 - 美联社新闻
item.description: 中国国防部长更新威胁要在开放安全论坛时接管台湾＆nbsp; nbsp; ap news <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMirAFBVV95cUxNT1hKZ291T1gxU21BYzJPY3hPa2gxR0xVNk5GcDd4Rm9XNE1QYVFvQWxCTDlRM1NXak1JT19tTWxiaUZLMzN ADTU3OE5NVC03A0LOB0NIXZNFMZNXBMNBDVRKVKHPDNV5BLIXQ2 ZZVJLSUHZJTJTJLJLJLJLJLJLJLJLJLJLJLJLJLJLJEWVWZV r5n3fyzmy1enrdyti1r2r2qnjqslldy2j0wtnxzhzmmu5fwedotk9odm9lavhcuejk？oc = 5“ Target =“ _ Blank”>中国国防部长敦促更大的团结避免'丛林法律' href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmirgfbvv95cuxqmlhweklhweklmseznafzvwnbpsmjpafe5djjjcwnvx xjcwnvxnvnvxnvnvnvnvnvnvnvx3pgoujjynr3pgoujynr3zdjjcveuuzcveuuzcfegn.dsefr3nr3 ssefxcrxcrxcrxcrxcrxcrxcrxcrxcrxcrxcrxcrxcrxcrxcrxcrxcrxcrxcrxcrxcrx dssr HLWBM14MJM4Y2N3U2PPELBHUGN4QLR1DXHZU292N1ZOQ0GXC0GXC01AY0PSBMDSC09LN21WWE9UT wrrwkk3eujgslzwngrivdkzdnhrttexsur5mkzwtjzmb29atktsd0jhttzkm3dhyke？oc = 5“ Target =“ _ Blank”>中国国防部长警告台湾，谴责'欺凌' href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmi0afbvv95cuxpdxqzt29lbxy1mtitvvjcsfrw OUMWSMTXQWLFB01MV3OYTFVBWE1JT0L2OEJRTHNWR3NYMW04NKPGWTBINEJHA21FNW04T24WSDV2MDLRUHV UUFR4ATLODKLHUXL5T0VKWXRWEUCYBK5SBWPRA2PWVVMTDUPJCNY0S251BEXOM3JOYI1ONVV5BW5IANVICL nnsgz5zetecvltudrwr2M5CWPUCWVFTUZXDERSAKC2A2ZUWJHPANNPENHPENHFTXN4NN204D25OYLNYD2DS？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>中国国防部长猛烈抨击西方'欺凌'，集会地区盟友＆nbsp; South Chine Morning post 中国向我们发出隐蔽的警告＆nbsp;＆nbsp; newsweek

item.title: 罢工和反对预算削减的罢工和游行导致整个法国的中断，发生了141次逮捕 -
item.description: 罢工和反对预算削减的行军导致整个法国的中断，并逮捕了141次 - 发生＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiswfbvv95cuxntel5mxiwedjnn3 VSRFYZTWZ0V050NDJOVHHAYK5MRGXOBKZFR2DVD2HLR3ZNUNRELVZ1OVNKWFNARXDTD1A2Z1ZH Y3GZY0DUSVAWRNPRTHHSSWLVRTLZWFBVRUXDATNCNCNCNCNCNCNKLIY3B3S3LIZEFOTLFXWDG3SKXMLTLTDE fvqi1atzzjvvvccy0douflxb1pftk42mhbpdvhuawm4mmd6oflrlld2qtrkhirjbdbw？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>法国博物馆中的卢浮宫和大宫殿因全国性的罢工而关闭＆nbsp; nbsp; 艺术报纸href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwkfvx3lxtfayzme0lurzdnf4cdmtszv0rjuzx25k ME5KAC1KCVFQLWFYOURXUWN4DLVQA0JHOGRMSUPUCFJ5Q0ZMOXPEDNFNRFNIAVNRFNIAVNMUZWC0TKM3JNZKD1UQ？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>在法国罢工跨预算​​削减计划＆nbsp;＆nbsp; bbc 在法国进行罢工行动，因为成千上万的抗议活动＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmihafbvv95cuxoqxlkc21vegu1ltj0uui2dy1fzejlbhbhbhbadzhkynjnjnzdity0vczkk5kduy5dd tg2c00xyurmlxpxos1kuhazetzrmhc1cl9yx1m3eg9gcm4zx3jmtzhszhszmrrrrnm5xrjnptlhpnjhfnjhfnjhfngy1edlzvxxvxvusm96nmqmmqmmq1vxkktbb2lararxmmzrxmzrxmzrxmzr20？ target =“ _ blank”>反紧缩罢工和抗议法国抓住法国＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 纽约时报
